thread.title: HSBC innovation chief: Distributed ledgers are 'here to stay'
thread.title_full: HSBC innovation chief: Distributed ledgers are 'here to stay'

author: Financial News
title: HSBC innovation chief: Distributed ledgers are 'here to stay'
text:
HSBC innovation chief: Distributed ledgers are 'here to stay' By Follow @annairrera 21 October 2015 Last June, HSBC set up a new innovation team tasked with identifying strategic innovation themes at a group level and making investments in young technology companies through a $200 million fund.
